title: Stage Lv4-A3-S11
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I apologize for any inconvenience caused. (variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I apologize for any inconvenience caused. (variant 1)
I understand the problem. (variant 1)
I'll investigate this immediately. (variant 1)
Let me find a solution for you. (variant 1)

sentences.kr: 이런 일이 다시 발생하지 않도록 하겠습니다. (v1)
sentences.en: We'll ensure this doesn't happen again. (variant 1)
I completely understand your position. (variant 1)
I'll look into compensation options. (variant 1)
Let me identify the root cause. (variant 1)
We'll develop an improvement plan. (variant 1)
Your feedback is very important to us. (variant 1)
I apologize for any inconvenience caused. (variant 2)
I understand the problem. (variant 2)
I'll investigate this immediately. (variant 2)
Let me find a solution for you. (variant 2)
